amendment.description: Amendment allows the Forest Service to establish a pilot program to execute contracts (638 contracts) with tribes under the Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act which allow tribes to manage and implement Federal programs in Indian Country.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in part C of House Report 114-192 to allow the Forest Service to create a pilot program that would execute contracts with tribes to perform administrative, management, and other functions of programs of the Tribal Forest Protection Act of 2004.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham (NM) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham (NM).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham (NM) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham (NM).
